metadata.title: CVE-2023-52776 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: wifi:ath12k: fix dfs-radar and temperature event locking The ath12k active pdevsare protected by RCU but the DFS-radar and temperature event handling codecalling ath12k_mac_get_ar_by_pdev_id() was not marked as a read-sidecritical section. Mark the code in question as RCU read-side criticalsections to avoid any potential use-after-free issues. Note that thetemperature event handler looks like a place holder currently but wouldstill trigger an RCU lockdep splat. Compile tested only.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
